Registration

Welcome to the registration portal for APF 2026.

Participation Fee Notice: APF 2026 will include a participation fee (amount to be announced). The fee is planned to cover open-access publication costs and core programme/social dinner costs. We are actively seeking sponsors via the call for sponsorship to reduce participant fees as far as possible, and fee updates will be published regularly.
Detailed registration information will be provided soon.
